comment:
QA Pre-Review: COMPLIANT. All verification items passed.

FRONTMATTER: title = "Interaction System Engine — VR Implementation" (present, non-empty). revision_summary = "Initial draft" (acceptable for v0.1 per SOP-001 Section 5.1; CR ID not required for initial creation per SOP-002 Section 8).

SECTION STRUCTURE: All 12 required sections present per SOP-002 Section 6: Purpose (1), Scope (2), Current State (3), Proposed State (4), Change Description (5), Justification (6), Impact Assessment (7), Testing Summary (8), Implementation Plan (9), Execution (10), Execution Summary (11), References (12).

PLACEHOLDER CONTENT: No TBD, TODO, FIXME, or XXX in pre-approved content (Sections 1-9, 12). Placeholder markers in editable fields (EI table execution columns, Section 11) are correct per SOP-004 Section 5 for PRE_REVIEW status.

EI TABLE: 19 execution items with all required columns per SOP-004 Section 4.2 (EI, Task Description, VR, Execution Summary, Task Outcome, Performed By - Date). EI-11 correctly flagged "Yes" in VR column for integration verification. EI-1 and EI-19 are pre/post-execution baseline commits per SOP-004 Section 5.

TESTING SUMMARY: Addresses both automated verification (qualification tests for 22 REQ-INT requirements) and integration verification (end-to-end VR authoring lifecycle) per SOP-002 Section 6.8.

DEVELOPMENT CONTROLS: Branch isolation (cr-091-interaction-system), test environment (.test-env/), write protection, qualification requirement, CI verification, PR merge gate, and submodule update documented per established code CR patterns.

TRACEABILITY: Valid references to governing SOPs (SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-004, SOP-005, SOP-006), affected SDLC documents (SDLC-QMS-RS v15.0, SDLC-QMS-RTM v19.0), TEMPLATE-VR v1.0, and design session documents.

FORMATTING: Consistent section numbering, properly formatted tables, no typographical errors detected.

TU ASSIGNMENT: No TU reviewers assigned. All affected systems (qms-cli, QMS process documents) are outside Flow State TU domains (tu_ui, tu_scene, tu_sketch, tu_sim). QA review is sufficient for pre-review of this infrastructure CR.
